feat\(dashboard\): add V5 hybrid AI matcher for recommendations

Performance optimizations:
- Add React.memo to Input, Textarea, Button components
- Add useCallback to ProfileForm and CompanySearch handlers
- Reduce unnecessary re-renders on form input

V5 Hybrid Matcher implementation:

- Region match \(30pts\): User''s region + National fallback
- Sector match \(25pts\): NAF code/label + sector + categories
- Project types \(20pts\): User interests vs subsidy keywords
- Website intelligence \(15pts\): Innovation, sustainability, export scores
- Timing \(10pts\): Deadline proximity sweet spot

Dashboard updates:
- Show "Score par IA" indicator when AI scoring used
- Display match reasons as purple badges on SubsidyCard
- Show match percentage for high-confidence recommendations

EOF
